abstract: Russian court begins hearing testimony in trial of Nadiya V Savchenko, Ukrainian helicopter pilot charged in 2014 deaths of two Russian journalists in eastern Ukraine; Savchenko is also charged with entering Russia illegally while fighting in volunteer battalion alongside Ukrainian troops against Russian-backed separatists.
lead_paragraph: The pilot, Nadiya V. Savchenko, is charged in the deaths of two Russian journalists, along with entering Russia illegally.

headline.main: Russian Trial Starts for Pilot From Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Russian Trial Starts for Pilot From Ukraine

snippet: The pilot, Nadiya V. Savchenko, is charged in the deaths of two Russian journalists, along with entering Russia illegally.
